mapper.sql: code,company_code,trans_code,user_code,location, (select name from transformer where code=trans_code)transName, (select name from auth_user_info where code=user_code) userName,checkin_time, checkin_type,work_duration,address,img_url,late,location

mapper.select: select count(id) from attendance where trans_code=#{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select code as code,name as name , genre as genre,orders as orders, photo as photo,status as status,type as type from trans_templete where 1=1 and type=#{hanvorsType}

insert into items
code,
trans_code,
type,
name,
menu,
unit,
column_code,

#{transCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
SELECT CODE CODE, FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time / 1000,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(connect_time / 1000,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') connectTime, ar.trans_code transCode, (SELECT NAME FROM transformer WHERE CODE = ar.trans_code) transName, jiao_person jiaoPerson FROM attendance_record ar where 1=1
and ar.trans_code in (${transCode})
and (FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time/1000,'%Y-%m')=#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time/1000,'%Y')=#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
order by create_time DESC

select CODE , FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')connectTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(create_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d')createTime, record record , trans_code as transCode, jiao_person jiaoPerson from attendance_record ar where 1=1
and code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
